About

I'm a Ruby on Rails developer, trained by thoughtbot engineers in Boston through their Metis web development bootcamp.

I'm fond of Ruby on Rails, Ruby, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Git, and the amazing things you can build with them.

Contact

I'd love to hear from you if you're hiring, looking for some extra help, or just want to say hello.

Rank And File

Allows visitors to see how a sitting member of the United States Senate compares to their colleagues of the same tenure. Benchmarks are based upon the number of bills sponsored, bills co-sponsored, amendments sponsored, and amendments co-sponsored.

View on Heroku

Draft Prep

Fantasy Football Draft Prep app. Maximize your weekly projections, while staying within your auction budget.

View on Heroku

Two Cents

Collaborative sharing app. Allows for uploads of documents, audio, video via Paperclip, with live chat powered by Pusher.

Pft Clone

A very simple blog site based on the ProFootballTalk website. (I love me some football!)
